price: ọ̀nà àwọn tí O ṣe ìdẹ̀ra fún,¹ yàtọ̀ sí (ọ̀nà) àwọn ẹni-ìbínú (ìyẹn, àwọn yẹhudi) àti (ọ̀nà) àwọn olùṣìnà (ìyẹn, àwọn nasọ̄rọ̄).
arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غَيۡرِ ٱلۡمَغۡضُوبِ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
footnotes: 1. Àwọn wo gan-an ni àwọn tí Allāhu ṣe ìdẹ̀ra fún, tí àwa mùsùlùmí ń tọ ojú-ọ̀nà wọn? Ẹ ka sūrah Mọryam;19:58.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ṣirāṭa alladhīna anʿamta ʿalayhim ghayri al-maghḍūbi ʿalayhim walā al-ḍālīna
